@NonNls

Package io.github.ddimitrov.nuggets

nuggets is a set of loosely coupled utilities for Java 8 - see each class javadoc for details.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    TextTable.Style
    Specifies the characters used to draw the lines and corners of a table.
    ThrowingRunnable
    Functional interface for a void, parameterless lambda.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Exceptions
    Utility class providing methods for dealing with checked exceptions and huge stacktraces.
    ExceptionTransformerBuilder
    Builds a transformer function manipulating exception messages, stack traces and nesting structure.
    Extractors
    Provides utilities for circumventing Java encapsulation, as well as building blocks for custom dependency injection.
    TextTable
    Formats data as text-table, suitable for logging and printing.
    TextTable.Column
    Defines the formatting attributes for a single column.
    TextTable.DataBuilder
    This builder can be used to build a dataset, that can be used together with the specified layout (a set of columns) to create a table.
    TextTable.LayoutBuilder
    Provides a nice and compact DSL to build a set of columns.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    TextTable.Box
    Preset styles, specifying the characters used to draw the lines and corners of a table.

Package io.github.ddimitrov.nuggets Description

nuggets is a set of loosely coupled utilities for Java 8 - see each class javadoc for details.
